mi::shader_v3::Subdivision34::Face

mi::shader_v3::Subdivision34::Face Struct Reference

face data structure for triangles and quads m_vertices contains either 3 or 4 indices into the vector spaces. use get_vector to access the positions, textures etc using the vertex indices. m_material is the material tag for the given face. More...

#include <shader_sds34.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

face data structure for triangles and quads m_vertices contains either 3 or 4 indices into the vector spaces. use get_vector to access the positions, textures etc using the vertex indices. m_material is the material tag for the given face.
